name: Verify and Update the Employee Role
processScenario: Verify and Update the Employee Role in ERP system
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually check the statuses of the open purchase orders and update the same in the user requested excel sheet
automationScope: Automatically download the ticket details and verify the details in ERP system and send the mail to the requestor about the status

name: Checking the status of PO
processScenario: Checking the status of Purchase Orders in ERP system
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually identify the Pricing changes from Excel sheet and update the changes in the respective Purchase Order. Also, update the contract price and the "validity from date"
automationScope: Automatically check the statuses of the open purchase orders and update the same in the user requested excel sheet

name: Update Purchase Order Price
summaryAsIsProcess:
1)Manually download ticket data from Service now 
2)Validate the details from ERP
3)Check GRC report for violations, send mail for Approval and upadate the status of ticket
automationScope: Automatically update purchase order price & contract price changes in Purchase Order and also update the Contract Price Validity from date

name: Check the violations using GRC report
processScenario: Download Governance Risk and Compliance (GRC) Report and check for violations
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually attach the customer purchase orders to sales orders in the ERP system
automationScope: Automatically download the ticket details, validate the details, check for violations, send approval Email and update the ticket status

name: Attach Customer Purchase Orders to Sales orders
processScenario: Attach Customer Purchase Orders to Sales orders
summaryAsIsProcess:
1) Manually download the Accounts Receivable (AR) reports from ERP for all customers and all company codes. 
2) If AR is ageing more than 30 days, send a mail to the team
automationScope: Automatically attach the customer purchase orders to sales orders in the ERP system

name: Generate AR Ageing Report
summaryAsIsProcess:
1) Manually download the Accounts Payable (AP) reports from ERP for all customers and all company codes. 
2) If APis ageing more than 30 days, send a mail to the team
automationScope: Automatically download the Accounts Receivable (AR) data and email to the team for AR ageing > 30 days

name: Generate AP Ageing Report
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually create Payment Run trasaction for different companies by entering data into ERP
automationScope: Automatically download the Accounts Payable (AP) data and email to the team for AP ageing > 30 days

name: Create Payment Run transaction
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually convert the stockist/distributor's purchase order which is in PDF format to sale order
automationScope: Automatically create payment run transaction for different companies in ERP system

name: SO creation via PDF
processScenario: Convert Distributors (PDF) Orders to Sales Order
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually validate customer maintenance request and its processing in ERP system
automationScope: Automatically convert the distributor's purchase order which is in PDF format to sale order

name: Edit exiting Customer
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually identify the Pricing changes based on vendor details for Items from the input excel sheet and update the changes in the purchase contract. Also, update the contract price "validity from date"
automationScope: Automatically validate customer maintenance request and its processing in ERP system

name: Update Purchase Contract Price & Validity date
processScenario: Update Purchase Contract Price & Validity date
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually check the statuses of the open deliveries and update the same in the user requested excel sheet
automationScope: Automatically update contract price in Purchase Contract for the Item and also update the contract Price Validity from date

name: Checking the status of Deliveries
processScenario: Checking the status of Deliveries in ERP system
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually validate vendor maintenance request and process it in ERP
automationScope: Automatically check the statuses of the open deliveries and update the same in the user requested excel sheet

name: Edit existing Vendor
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually change the company code address
automationScope: Automatically validate vendor maintenance request and process it in ERP

name: Update Company Code Address
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually update the item footprint details and the dimensions of the each item in each unit of measure (Each, Case, Layer and Pallet) in JDA application
automationScope: Automatically change the company code address

name: Update Item Dimensions
summaryAsIsProcess:
1)Manually downloading the Bank GL data
2) Check for debit entries for customer
3) Update the Receipt in the customer ledger
automationScope: Automatically update the item footprint details and the dimensions of the each item in each unit of measure (Each, Case, Layer and Pallet) in JDA application

name: Download bank GL data and update the customer outstanding
processScenario: Download bank GL data and update the customer outstanding
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually create a plant in the ERP system based on the usage type and send the confirmation details to requester
automationScope: Automatically download of Bank GL and fetch the receipt data and update the customer outstanding

name: Plant Creation in ERP System
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually change sales required delivery date and order quantity in sales inquiry in ERP system
automationScope: Automatically create a plant in the ERP system based on the usage type and send the confirmation details to requester

name: Sales Order updates
processScenario: Change Sales Inquiry details in ERP system
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually check the master data(BOM, Finance, Pricing etc) of the material
automationScope: Automatically change sales required delivery date and order quantity in sales inquiry in ERP system

name: Validate BOM and Routing for new products
processScenario: Validate BOM and Routing for new products
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually change the Inco term in purchase order
automationScope: Automatically check the master data(BOM, Finance, Pricing etc) of the material

name: Update Inco term in purchase order
processScenario: Update Inco term in purchase order
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually update the standard invoice template with the vendor and invoice details and notify the vendor about the payment details in a email
automationScope: Automatically change the Inco term in purchase order

name: Payment Processing for vendors
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually update the warehouse details for the open sales orders from the material master data
automationScope: Automatically update the standard invoice template with the vendor and invoice details and notify the vendor about the payment details in a email

name: Update the warehouse details in the sales order
processScenario: Update the warehouse details in the sales order
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually validate the new customer request and create new customer in ERP system
automationScope: Automatically update the warehouse details for the open sales orders from the material master data

name: Create new Customer
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually download the data and reconcile the GR(goods receipt)/ & IR(Invoice receipt) amount and update the status
automationScope: Automatically validate the new customer request and create new customer in ERP system

name: GR IR Reconciliation
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually change the 'Delivery quantity' and 'Planned goods movement date' of Outbound delivery in ERP system
automationScope: Automatically download the Transaction Detais, GR/IR reports

name: Outbound Delivery Updates
processScenario: Change Outbound delivery details in ERP system
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually capture PO ageing data using Delivery on Time(DOT) and notify suppliers
automationScope: Automatically change the 'Delivery quantity' and 'Planned goods movement date' of Outbound delivery in ERP system

name: Identify and notify PO ageing using Delivery on Time(DOT)
processScenario: Identify and notify PO ageing using Delivery on Time(DOT)
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually block/unblock the customers in the ERP system
automationScope: Automatically capture PO ageing data using Delivery on Time(DOT) and notify suppliers

name: Block/Unblock Customer
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually lock/unlock the user (IT) profiles
automationScope: Automatically block/unblock of the customers in the ERP system

name: Lock/Unlock the existing user
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually change the storage location address
automationScope: Automatically lock/unlock the user (IT) profiles

name: Update Storage Location Address
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually post each and every GL data in different Accounting priniciple and create International Financial Reporting Standard (IFRS-16) report
automationScope: Automatically change the storage location address

name: Create IFRS 16 report
processScenario: Create International Finance Reporting Standards-16 report
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually assign roles for the user (IT) profiles
automationScope: Automatically post each and every financial entry in different Accounting priniciple and create IFRS-16 report

name: Assign Roles to user profiles
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually block/unblock the vendors in the ERP system
automationScope: Automatically assign roles for the user (IT) profiles

name: Block/Unblock vendor
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually reconcile the master data obtained from the different ERP system
automationScope: Automatically block/unblock the vendors in the ERP system

name: Reconcile Master data
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually compare the PDF remittance advice from retailer and clear invoices
automationScope: Automatically reconcile the master data obtained from the different ERP system

name: Customer Invoice Clearing w.r.t remittance advice
processScenario: Automate Customer Invoice Clearing wrt Remittance advice
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually reconcile the costing data obtained from the different ERP system
automationScope: Automatically compare the PDF remittance advice from retailer and clear invoices

name: Reconcile Costing data
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually reconcile the pricing data obtained from the different ERP system
automationScope: Automatically reconcile the costing data obtained from the different ERP system

name: Reconcile Pricing Data
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually Short Close the Purchase Order by checking the delivery completion Flag
automationScope: Automatically reconcile the pricing data obtained from the different ERP system

name: PO Short Closure
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually update the validity date to terminate the user
automationScope: Automatically short close the purchase orders by checking the delivery completion Flag

name: Terminate User
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually download the data and create/update the contract based on the request
automationScope: Automatically update the validity date to terminate the user in ERP system

name: Create and Update Purchase Contracts
summaryAsIsProcess:
1)Manually download the customer AR details
2) Identify the payment term, rebate under the payment term and validity period
3)Notify the customer of rebate offered and payment due date
automationScope: Automatally download the data from E-mail and create/update the contract based on the request

name: Customer intimation for due date and outstanding
processScenario: Notify Customer on payment due date and advance payment rebates
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually validate new vendor request and if valid, create new vendor in ERP system
automationScope: Automatically download the customer's AR details, identify payment terms, calculate discounted amount and notify the customer

name: Create new vendor
summaryAsIsProcess:
1) Manually download the product details from Email
2) Reconcile the product details from Customer's master database
3) Manually upload the new product details in company distribution system
automationScope: Automatically validate new vendor request and if valid, create new vendor in ERP system

name: Reconcile product details
processScenario: Download and reconcile product details between Manufacturing & Distribution systems
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually create purchase requisition to purchase an asset in the ERP system
automationScope: Automatically download the product details, reconcile them with the Customer's master database and update the product details in company distribution system

name: Create Asset purchase request
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually create the requested user (IT) profiles
automationScope: Automatically create purchase requisition to purchase an asset in the ERP system

name: Create new IT user
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually create standard plant code creation for Procurement/goods receivable/Quality Checks,sub contracting to make the plant operational quickly
automationScope: Automatically create the requested user (IT) profiles

name: Create standard plant code in ERP system
processScenario: Create standard plant code in ERP system
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually perform mass updation/closure/deletion of the Purchase Orders
automationScope: Automatically create standard plant code creation for Procurement/goods receivable/Quality Checks,sub contracting to make the plant operational quickly

name: Perform Mass PO Update
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually perform mass updation/closure/deletion of the Purchase Orders
automationScope: Automatically perform mass updation/closure/deletion of the Purchase Orders
